statements: DELETE FROM Loans WHERE loan_id = 1 AND approval_status = 'PENDING';
DELETE FROM Loans WHERE amount > 10000 AND interest_rate > 5.0;
DELETE FROM Loans WHERE approval_status IN ('APPROVED', 'REJECTED');
DELETE FROM Loans WHERE id = 1001 AND interest_rate < 5.5;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2005 AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM Applications WHERE application_id = 3002 AND customer_id = 2002 AND loan_id = 1003;
DELETE FROM Loans WHERE loan_id = 1234 AND approval_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM Payments WHERE payment_id = 9876 AND payment_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate > 0.1 AND approval_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM Borrowers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'Rejected' AND application_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAYS);
